name: Matthew Stanciu
title: Matthew Stanciu
description: A 17-year-old high school hacker from West Lafayette, IN

projects.name: Windy City Hacks
projects.desc: On June 22-23, 2019, I ran Windy City Hacks, a 24-hour high school hackathon in Chicago. I spent 4 months leading a team of 7 to organize this event, raising a total of $14k and garnering 320 signups (160 of which attended).

projects.name: West Lafayette Hack Club
projects.desc: I've been leading a Hack Club at my high school for 2 years. Meetings run like mini-hackathons where students learn to code by working on self-directed projects.

projects.name: Hack Pennsylvania
projects.desc: On January 19-20, 2019, I helped organize Pennsylvania's largest high school hackathon in State College, PA. After 3 months of organizing, we raised $15k and garnered 207 signups (111 of which attended).

projects.name: CodeDay Indianapolis
projects.desc: Last August, I started CodeDay Indianapolis, which ran for the first time on November 10-11, 2018 and for the second time on February 16-17, 2019. Though small (15-20 attendees), it was the first event of its kind ever organized in Indiana.
